alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Holmes; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Jackson; North Walton; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 18 at 3:12AM EDT until October 18 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY AND DRY FUELS FOR PORTIONS OF SOUTHEAST ALABAMA AND THE FLORIDA PANHANDLE... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY AND DRY FUELS FOR PORTIONS OF SOUTHEAST ALABAMA AND THE FLORIDA PANHANDLE... The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 11 AM to 7 PM CDT today. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 065, 066, 067, 068, and 069. Fire weather zones 007, 008, 009, 010, 011, 012, 013, 014, 108, 112, and 114. * WIND...Northerly around 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * HUMIDITY...18 to 25 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
